idea-plugin.name: Rovo LSP
idea-plugin.description:
Syntax highlighting for Rovo framework annotations in Rust.

Features

  • Context-aware syntax highlighting for Rovo annotations
  • Highlights annotation keywords (@response, @tag, @security, @example, @id, @hidden)
  • Highlights HTTP status codes (200, 404, 500, etc.)
  • Highlights security schemes (bearer, basic, apiKey, oauth2)
  • Only activates near #[rovo] attributes to avoid conflicts

LSP Support

For additional features (completions, hover, code actions), install rovo-lsp:

cargo install rovo-lsp

Then configure it as an external LSP server in your IDE settings.
